column4: yeah i know. i wanted to install ubuntu. my point was after reboot i m getting a blank screemn
yeah after i clicked the install button, after
i get an option, try iwthout installation or install. i clcked install. blank screen
should i change anything in the setup of Dell
since i was not able to install any linux version i installed , win7. installation waas smooth. then i used " wubi " installer of ubuntu.. after reboot. same blank screen
nothing s in the screen. it s black. same like when switched, but lap is on.
i had the exact problem what fixed it for me was

I plugged my laptop in DIRECTLY to the modem with the ethernet cord, after that everything worked perfect, I think it downloads via internet while installing I thought it could through wifi but using direct plugin fixed it
I know I have windows 7 too, i can dual boot into win7 and ubuntu
yes I know, i had the same problem
like i said, plug your laptop into the internet through a cord and not wifi, then do the install
My disk was the same size, all im telling you is this. Plug your laptop in with the cord and trust me. It will work.
I'm telling you the fix, why don't you do as I said lol.
yes, put the cd in, plug your internet cord in, and restart your computer and do the installation
